verses.verse: How doth the city <S%H5892><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> solitary <S%H910><s%>, that was full <S%H7227><s%> of people <S%H5971><s%> ! how is she become as a widow <S%H490><s%> ! she that was great <S%H7227><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and princess <S%H8282><s%> among the provinces <S%H4082><s%>, how is she become tributary <S%H4522><s%> !

She weepeth <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sore <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>, and her tears <S%H1832><s%> are on her cheeks <S%H3895><s%>: among all her lovers <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> she hath none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8764><s%> her: all her friends <S%H7453><s%> have dealt treacherously <S%H898><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with her, they are become her enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> is gone into captivity <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8804><s%> because of affliction <S%H6040><s%>, and because of great <S%H7230><s%> servitude <S%H5656><s%>: she dwelleth <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, she findeth <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no rest <S%H4494><s%>: all her persecutors <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%> overtook <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her between the straits <S%H4712><s%>.

The ways <S%H1870><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> do mourn <S%H57><s%>, because none come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to the solemn feasts <S%H4150><s%>: all her gates <S%H8179><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: her Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> sigh <S%H584><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, her virgins <S%H1330><s%> are afflicted <S%H3013><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, and she is in bitterness <S%H4843><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Her adversaries <S%H6862><s%> are the chief <S%H7218><s%>, her enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> prosper <S%H7951><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; for the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath afflicted <S%H3013><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of her transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: her children <S%H5768><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the enemy <S%H6862><s%>.

And from the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> all her beauty <S%H1926><s%> is departed <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: her princes <S%H8269><s%> are become like harts <S%H354><s%> that find <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no pasture <S%H4829><s%>, and they are gone <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> without strength <S%H3581><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the pursuer <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of her affliction <S%H6040><s%> and of her miseries <S%H4788><s%> all her pleasant things <S%H4262><s%> that she had in the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>, when her people <S%H5971><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the enemy <S%H6862><s%>, and none did help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8802><s%> her: the adversaries <S%H6862><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her, and did mock <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8804><s%> at her sabbaths <S%H4868><s%>.

Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> hath grievously <S%H2399><s%> sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; therefore she is removed <S%H5206><s%>: all that honoured <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8764><s%> her despise <S%H2107><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her, because they have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> her nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: yea, she sigheth <S%H584><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and turneth <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> backward <S%H268><s%>.

Her filthiness <S%H2932><s%> is in her skirts <S%H7757><s%>; she remembereth <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not her last end <S%H319><s%>; therefore she came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> wonderfully <S%H6382><s%>: she had no comforter <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8764><s%>. O YY <S%H3068><s%>, behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my affliction <S%H6040><s%>: for the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hath magnified <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8689><s%> himself.

The adversary <S%H6862><s%> hath spread out <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> upon all her pleasant things <S%H4261><s%>: for she hath seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the heathen <S%H1471><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into her sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>, whom thou didst command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> that they should not enter <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into thy congregation <S%H6951><s%>.

All her people <S%H5971><s%> sigh <S%H584><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, they seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>; they have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their pleasant things <S%H4261><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H4262><s%> for meat <S%H400><s%> to relieve <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%>: see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, and consider <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; for I am become vile <S%H2151><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Is it nothing to you, all ye that pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%> by <S%H1870><s%>? behold <S%H5027><s%> <S%H8685><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> if there be <S%H3426><s%> any sorrow <S%H4341><s%> like unto my sorrow <S%H4341><s%>, which is done <S%H5953><s%> <S%H8776><s%> unto me, wherewith the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath afflicted <S%H3013><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%>.

From above <S%H4791><s%> hath he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> into my bones <S%H6106><s%>, and it prevaileth <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against them: he hath spread <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> for my feet <S%H7272><s%>, he hath turned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me back <S%H268><s%>: he hath made <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8802><s%> and faint <S%H1739><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.

The yoke <S%H5923><s%> of my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> is bound <S%H8244><s%> <S%H8738><s%> by his hand <S%H3027><s%>: they are wreathed <S%H8276><s%> <S%H8691><s%>, and come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon my neck <S%H6677><s%>: he hath made my strength <S%H3581><s%> to fall <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, the YY <S%H136><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me into their hands <S%H3027><s%>, from whom I am not able <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

The YY <S%H136><s%> hath trodden under foot <S%H5541><s%> <S%H8765><s%> all my mighty <S%H47><s%> men in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of me: he hath called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> an assembly <S%H4150><s%> against me to crush <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8800><s%> my young men <S%H970><s%>: the YY <S%H136><s%> hath trodden <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the virgin <S%H1330><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, as in a winepress <S%H1660><s%>.

For these things I weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; mine eye <S%H5869><s%>, mine eye <S%H5869><s%> runneth down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with water <S%H4325><s%>, because the comforter <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8764><s%> that should relieve <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8688><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from me: my children <S%H1121><s%> are desolate <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, because the enemy <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> prevailed <S%H1396><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> spreadeth forth <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8765><s%> her hands <S%H3027><s%>, and there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8764><s%> her: the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> concerning Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, that his adversaries <S%H6862><s%> should be round about <S%H5439><s%> him: Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> is as a menstruous woman <S%H5079><s%> among them.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> is righteous <S%H6662><s%>; for I have rebelled <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against his Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%>: hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, all people <S%H5971><s%>, and behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my sorrow <S%H4341><s%>: my virgins <S%H1330><s%> and my young men <S%H970><s%> are gone <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into captivity <S%H7628><s%>.

I called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for my lovers <S%H157><s%> <S%H8764><s%>, but they deceived <S%H7411><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me: my Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and mine elders <S%H2205><s%> gave up the ghost <S%H1478><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%>, while they sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their meat <S%H400><s%> to relieve <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%> their souls <S%H5315><s%>.

Behold <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O YY <S%H3068><s%>; for I am in distress <S%H6887><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: my bowels <S%H4578><s%> are troubled <S%H2560><s%> <S%H8777><s%>; mine heart <S%H3820><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> me; for I have grievously <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8800><s%> rebelled <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: abroad <S%H2351><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> bereaveth <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, at home <S%H1004><s%> there is as death <S%H4194><s%>.

They have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I sigh <S%H584><s%> <S%H8737><s%>: there is none to comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8764><s%> me: all mine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of my trouble <S%H7451><s%>; they are glad <S%H7797><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it: thou wilt bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that thou hast called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and they shall be like <S%H3644><s%> unto me.

Let all their wickedness <S%H7451><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> thee; and do <S%H5953><s%> <S%H8778><s%> unto them, as thou hast done <S%H5953><s%> <S%H8782><s%> unto me for all my transgressions <S%H6588><s%>: for my sighs <S%H585><s%> are many <S%H7227><s%>, and my heart <S%H3820><s%> is faint <S%H1742><s%>.
